name: Sampling
description: specifies the sampling of the physical model.

classes.name: Input
classes.description: defines an input to the model.

identifier.description: identifies the input in the model.

range_begin.description: indicates the begining of the value range.

range_end.description: indicates the end of the value range.

embeds.name: Output
embeds.description: defines the outcome (remaining useful life, RUL).

identifier.description: identifies the outcome in the model.

range_begin.description: indicates the begining of the value range.

range_end.description: indicates the end of the value range.

output.description: specifies the outcome variable (remaining useful life, RUL).

bins.description: specifies the number of sampling bins.
